name: Swarovski Dextera hoop earrings, Round cut, Mini, White, Gold-tone plated
product_description: Swarovski Earrings Empower and elevate in equal measure with our radiant range of earrings. Our selection includes something for everyone, from classic styles to bold statement pieces. Choose from an array of styles, including chic stud earrings, statement drop earrings, playful hoop earrings, and edgy ear cuffs, all showcasing Swarovski's long heritage of master crystal craftsmanship. Whether pierced earrings or clip earrings, there's a pair to express every side of yourself in gold-tone, silver-tone, or rose gold-tone finished styles. Cleaning & Care Instructions: Keep your products stored in a safe space to avoid damage. We recommend polishing frequently with a lint-free cloth and always putting your jewelry on last. Keep away from liquids and sprays such as perfume to ensure that your jewelry maintains its brilliance.
